00057 class VTK_ESQUI_SCENARIO_EXPORT vtkToolCollection : public vtkCollection
00058 {
00059 public:
00060     static vtkToolCollection *New() {return new vtkToolCollection;}
00061     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkToolCollection,vtkCollection);
00062     const char *GetClassName() {return "vtkToolCollection";}
00063     virtual void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00064 
00066 
00069     void InsertTool(vtkIdType id, vtkTool * tool);
00071 
00075     void InsertNextTool(vtkTool * tool);
00077 
00080     vtkTool * GetTool(vtkIdType id);
00082 
00086     vtkTool * GetNextTool();
00087 
00088 protected:
00089     //   vtkIdType NumeroDeHerramientas;

00091     ~vtkToolCollection() {};
00092

00094     vtkToolCollection(const vtkToolCollection&);  // Not implemented.
00095     void operator=(const vtkToolCollection&);  // Not implemented.
00096 };
